articles.title: Before Artemis came Apollo: How NASA took its baby steps to the Moon - The Indian Express
articles.description: Much before NASA's Artemis program came the Apollo program, which is the first, and so far, last program to put a human on the Moon. Here is a brief history of the Apollo program and how NASA put man on the Moon.
articles.content: In 1962, John F. Kennedy, US President at the time, gave a rousing speech at Rice University, where he famously said, We choose to go to the Moon… We choose to go to the Moon in this decade and do th… [+7170 chars]
